DOC.brief_title: Do Cobalt Chrome Stent Paclitaxel-Eluting Stent Have Equivalent Clinical Result Non-Complex Lesion ?
DOC.detailed_description: Drug-eluting stent ( DES ) prove reduced restenosis rate dramatically compare bare metal stent ( BMS ) . However , long-term safety DES still uncertain . Recent meta-analysis show late stent thrombosis rate high DES group although overall mortality similar 2 group . The safety issue DES first suggest BASKET-LATE study , compare cobalt chromium alloy BMS ( VISIONÂ® , Guidant , USA ) sirolimus- paclitaxel-coated DES . The study show significantly high rate death myocardial infarction DES group 7 18 month procedure ( BMS 1.3 % , DES 4.9 % , p=0.01 ) . Moreover , benefit reduce target vessel revascularization find even possibility late harm patient treat DES large native vessel . We perform multicenter prospective randomize study compare paclitaxel-eluting stent cobalt chromium stent several year , originally see whether major adverse cardiac event significantly low DES compare thin-strut BMS non-complex lesion subset . In article , would like investigate 2-year clinical event DES BMS group .
